move_to_node.action_desc: The robot moves to the specified node in the network, provided there is an edge connecting the current node to the target node. The robot can only move along edges that are part of the network. The robot must be at a valid node to begin moving.
translated_preconditions: the robot is currently at node ?x
there is an edge connecting node ?x and node ?y
node ?y has not been visited yet
translated_effects: the robot is not at node ?x

visit_node.action_desc: The robot visits the node, marking it as visited in the route. The robot can only visit each node once. This action cannot be performed if the node has already been visited. Visiting a node is necessary to complete the route.
translated_preconditions: the robot is currently at node ?x
node ?x has not been visited yet

unvisit_node.action_desc: The robot unmarks the node as visited, making it available to be visited again if needed. This action may be used during certain search strategies. The node must have previously been visited to unvisit it. Unvisiting nodes is typically part of a backtracking or exploration strategy.
translated_effects: the node ?x has not been visited
the node ?x has not been visited yet

check_edge.action_desc: The robot checks if there is an edge connecting the current node to a specific target node in the network. The robot can use this action to explore possible paths before making a move. This action does not change the state of the nodes.
translated_preconditions: the robot is currently at node ?x
node ?y has not been visited yet
there is an edge connecting node ?x and node ?y

parameters: ?x - node: the node where the robot completes the route
end_route.action_desc: The robot completes its route by reaching the last node in the path, ensuring that all nodes have been visited exactly once. The robot must have visited all nodes before performing this action. This action signifies the completion of the route.
translated_preconditions: for all nodes ?n, if node ?n is unvisited, then it is not visited
for all nodes ?n, if node ?n is visited, then it is not unvisited
translated_effects: for all nodes ?n, node ?n has been visited
